resources: ShoeStore Shoe Store Welcome to the store! Please login or sign up Email Password Sign Up Log In On the next screen, you will find instructions regarding how to use the app. Enjoy! The main screen of the app contains all the shoes listed in your shop, including information like: shoe name shoe size, description and company name From the shoe list screen, you can also add details for new shoes Go to instructions Show shoe list Login Welcome Instructions Shoe List Click the button to add a shoe to the list--> Hello blank fragment Shoe Details Enter the shoe details Name Company Size Description Save Cancel Logout One or more fields are empty. Please fill them and then Save
